item.name: ZX 5K BOOST Shoes
item.description: Ready for the future? You are in these adidas ZX 5K BOOST shoes. Bringing the best of modern technology into the ever-evolving ZX franchise, they charge up your stride and let your style shine. BOOST cushioning takes care of the comfort side of things. Translucent and reflective details keep your feet fresh.

item.name: X9000L4 Shoes
item.description: A few miles can be enough to reset your mind. These adidas running shoes keep you feeling good on short- to mid-distance runs. They ride on a full-length Boost midsole, which returns energy with every stride. The design draws inspiration from the virtual realm, with shocks of color and semi-translucent details that are reminiscent of a glowing screen. A glitched pattern on the outsole offers grippy traction on city streets.

item.name: Duramo SL 2.0 Shoes
item.description:
From a morning gym session to a day of errands to an evening with friends, keep your feet comfortable and your style on point in these adidas shoes. Pair them with your favorite running shorts for the ultimate athletic-casual vibe. A mesh upper helps you stay cool, while superlight cushioning cradles every step you take.
Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

item.name: X9000L2 Shoes
item.description: Always online, always plugged in, always moving forward. These adidas X9000L2 Shoes have a comfortable textile upper and flexible cushioning to get you where you need to go. As part of adidas' commitment to a healthier planet, the sockliner is algae-based, helping to clean liters of polluted lake water.

item.name: Ultraboost 4.0 DNA Shoes
item.description: A young legend. The adidas Ultraboost shoes debuted in 2015, and they became a go-to far beyond the realm of running. For good reason. The adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in support, adapting to the changing shape of your foot with each take-off and landing. Plush Boost cushioning returns energy with each stride. The more you give, the more you get. So give it your all. These were made for it.

item.name: Ozelia Shoes
item.description: If it all has to start somewhere, we'd say the '90s are a pretty solid launching point. Take these Ozelia Shoes. The DNA is straight out of adidas' past, but the futuristic look is all grown up with a sleek, monochromatic build. Adiprene cushioning makes every step feel like a good one.

item.name: Run Falcon 2.0 Shoes
item.description: Strap up in these running shoes and you're set for a jog in the park followed by coffee with friends. With a mesh upper for outstanding breathability, they're meant to deliver comfort all day long. A durable rubber outsole gives you a solid foundation no matter how busy your schedule.

item.name: Ultraboost 21 x Parley Shoes
item.description: Running pushes you outside, and it grows a love for the planet we play on. This version of the Ultraboost 21 is designed with the oceans in mind. With an adidas Primeknit upper and responsive BOOST in the midsole, the shoes feel as comfortable on short morning miles as they do on your next 10k.

item.name: Ozelia Shoes
item.description:
We may be a long way from the '90s, but these Ozelia Shoes are rooted in that loud, experimental era. Inspired by the adidas archives, the bold trainers have a chunky build that's all about being noticed. They're sleek with a fast look, and when your days are fast-paced, the Adiprene cushioning helps out on the comfort side of things.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Ozelia Shoes
item.description:
We may be a long way from the '90s, but these Ozelia Shoes are rooted in that loud, experimental era. Inspired by the adidas archives, the bold trainers have a chunky build that's all about being noticed. They're sleek with a fast look, and when your days are fast-paced, the Adiprene cushioning helps out on the comfort side of things.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Timeless appeal. Effortless style. Everyday versatility. For over 50 years and counting, adidas Stan Smith Shoes have continued to hold their place as an icon. This pair shows off a fresh redesign as part of adidas' commitment to use only recycled polyester by 2024. With a vegan upper and an outsole made from rubber waste, they still have iconic style, they're just made with the planet in mind.
This product is made with vegan alternatives to animal-derived ingredients or materials. It is also made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Easy on. Easy off. Easy on the planet. These adidas Stan Smith Shoes are crafted from recycled materials, part of adidas' commitment to end plastic waste. With a synthetic leather upper and an outsole made from rubber waste, they redefine an iconic style. Hook-and-loop straps make them easy to get into when you're heading out the door and even easier to kick off at the end of the day.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: 4DFWD Shoes
item.description: Feel progress every time you lace up with adidas 4DFWD, 3D printed midsole technology, designed to move you forward. When a foot impacts the ground, it applies braking forces. The 4DFWD midsole reduces these forces by redirecting the impact into forward motion. With every step, 4DFWD compresses forward, providing a smooth transition and a unique running experience.

item.name: 4DFWD Shoes
item.description: Feel progress every time you lace up with adidas 4DFWD, 3D printed midsole technology, designed to move you forward. When a foot impacts the ground, it applies braking forces. The 4DFWD midsole reduces these forces by redirecting the impact into forward motion. With every step, 4DFWD compresses forward, providing a smooth transition and a unique running experience.

item.name: Supernova x Marimekko Shoes
item.description: An easy way to unleash your inner power? Go for a run. In these adidas running shoes you'll feel confident before you even take your first step, thanks to a joyful print from Finnish design house Marimekko. Responsive Boost cushioning combines with springy Bounce for a smooth ride, and the soft knit upper strikes that perfect balance of flex and support.

item.name: Ozelia Shoes
item.description:
We may be a long way from the '90s, but these Ozelia Shoes are rooted in that loud, experimental era. Inspired by the adidas archives, the bold trainers have a chunky build that's all about being noticed. They're sleek with a fast look, and when your days are fast-paced, the Adiprene cushioning helps out on the comfort side of things.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: NMD_R1 Primeblue Shoes
item.description:
Pack your bag, lace up and get going. City adventures beckon in these NMD_R1 shoes. An update to an acclaimed '80s runner from the adidas archive, these modern sneakers have a soft, stretchy knit upper and energy-returning Boost cushioning for all-day comfort. Bold color and signature midsole plugs make a statement, so wherever you're headed, you're sure to show up in style.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: X9000L4 Shoes
item.description: A few miles can be enough to reset your mind. These adidas running shoes keep you feeling good on short- to mid-distance runs. They ride on a full-length Boost midsole, which returns energy with every stride. The design draws inspiration from the virtual realm, with shocks of color and semi-translucent details that are reminiscent of a glowing screen. A glitched pattern on the outsole offers grippy traction on city streets.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
What type of adventure calls to you? The city? The outskirts? No matter where you're headed, explore in style in these adidas NMD_R1 Shoes. Taking inspiration from archival outdoor gear, they show off pops of material that mimic the taping on technical jackets. The energizing Boost midsole and stretchy knit upper keep your feet comfy whether you're exploring the city or beyond.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
The adidas Stan Smith Shoes have been around for a while. Since 1971, to be exact. So they know about change. It's practically in their DNA. Born on the tennis courts, and then making moves just about everywhere else, they're not just unbelievably versatile — they're adaptable. This version updates the signature colors of the classic, as well as the materials.
Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

item.name: Duramo SL 2.0 Shoes
item.description:
From a morning gym session to a day of errands to an evening with friends, keep your feet comfortable and your style on point in these adidas shoes. Pair them with your favorite running shorts for the ultimate athletic-casual vibe. A mesh upper helps you stay cool, while superlight cushioning cradles every step you take.
Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
Stand out in the concrete jungle. Inspired by an acclaimed '80s runner from the adidas archives, these NMD_R1 Shoes provide a supportive sock-like fit. Energy-returning Boost provides all-day comfort, and midsole plugs on the sides stand out as the recognizable mark of iconic NMD style. If that isn't enough to draw some attention, the fresh colors sure will.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: X9000L2 Shoes
item.description:
When robots take over the world, you'll be able to outrun them in these adidas running shoes. They come equipped with lightweight and flexible Bounce cushioning. A booster pack of Jetboost in the heel delivers energy return and enhanced stability.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
The adidas Stan Smith Shoes have been around for a while. Since 1971, to be exact. So they know about change. It's practically in their DNA. Born on the tennis courts, and then making moves just about everywhere else, they're not just unbelievably versatile — they're adaptable. This version updates the signature colors of the classic, as well as the materials.
Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

item.name: Runfalcon 2.0 Shoes
item.description: Bored of your fitness routine and ready to try a little running? These adidas shoes are perfect for beginners who want to start off on the right foot. The textile upper is super breathable. A rubber outsole adds traction on wet surfaces. The lightweight build makes it easy to get your feet in motion.

item.name: Ozelia Shoes
item.description:
We may be a long way from the '90s, but these Ozelia Shoes are rooted in that loud, experimental era. Inspired by the adidas archives, the bold trainers have a chunky build that's all about being noticed. They're sleek with a fast look, and when your days are fast-paced, the Adiprene cushioning helps out on the comfort side of things.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Ultraboost 21 x Parley Shoes
item.description: Say hello to ultimate energy return. The adidas Ultraboost 21 x Parley Shoes give you more responsiveness in a design that keeps the planet in mind. The upper combines mesh, woven material and ripstop, all sourced from Parley Ocean Plastic. The design evokes the protective look of military gear, a visual representation of our need to protect the oceans.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Timeless appeal. Effortless style. Everyday versatility. For over 50 years and counting, adidas Stan Smith Shoes have continued to hold their place as an icon. This pair shows off a fresh redesign as part of adidas' commitment to use only recycled polyester by 2024. With a vegan upper and an outsole made from rubber waste, they still have iconic style, they're just made with the planet in mind.

The 4DFWD midsole reduces these forces by redirecting the impact into forward motion. With every step, 4DFWD compresses forward, providing a smooth transition and a unique running experience.

item.name: adidas 4DFWD Shoes
item.description:
Every run builds off the one before it. These running shoes ride on 17 years of data, with a design that makes progress feel like something you can chase and catch. The 3D-printed 4D midsole redirects energy forward, making your gait feel more like a glide. The adidas Primeknit+ upper works in tune with the midsole, giving you the support for a smooth, effortless stride. The rubber outsole is designed to work in harmony, providing superior traction.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: Runfalcon 2.0 Shoes
item.description: Bored of your fitness routine and ready to try a little running? These adidas shoes are perfect for beginners who want to start off on the right foot. The textile upper is super breathable. A rubber outsole adds traction on wet surfaces. The lightweight build makes it easy to get your feet in motion.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
For 50 years, the adidas Stan Smith Shoes have been a staple on the courts and on the streets. Their minimalist style is the very definition of effortless cool. But even icons have to change to stay rooted in the present, which is why this version of the trainers is created with recycled materials. It's part of our effort and commitment to help end plastic waste.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: Ultraboost 21 x Parley Shoes
item.description:
Raise your own bar. That's what adidas did when we updated the legendary Ultraboost running shoes with even more energy-returning benefits than before. The responsive Boost midsole, foot-hugging upper and grippy yet flexible sole are still here. Now, a Linear Energy Push system gives extra propulsion to each step with increased forefoot and midfoot stiffness. This version is made using recycled materials, part of adidas commitment to help end plastic waste.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 92% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
For 50 years, the adidas Stan Smith Shoes have been a staple on the courts and on the streets. Their minimalist style is the very definition of effortless cool. But even icons have to change to stay rooted in the present, which is why this version of the trainers is created with recycled materials. It's part of our effort and commitment to help end plastic waste.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: NMD_R1 Primeblue Shoes
item.description:
Pack your bag, lace up and get going. City adventures beckon in these NMD_R1 shoes. An update to an acclaimed '80s runner from the adidas archive, these modern sneakers have a soft, stretchy knit upper and energy-returning Boost cushioning for all-day comfort. Bold color and signature midsole plugs make a statement, so wherever you're headed, you're sure to show up in style.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
How to Make an Impression Without Really Trying: An adidas Guide. Step one, lace into these NMD_R1 Shoes. That's it. The quickest lesson of your life also happens to be the most comfortable. Shout-out to the energy-returning Boost midsole for that. And the sock-like fit.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
We live in a world that's constantly changing. You need shoes that can keep up. Merging running-inspired style with modern adidas technologies, these NMD_R1 sneakers have your back at every turn. Closed subway entrance? Last-minute invite? Surprise opportunity? The stretchy knit upper and energy-returning Boost bring comfort and ease to your day. Even if it ends up looking very different from what you imagined.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: 4DFWD Shoes
item.description: Feel progress every time you lace up with adidas 4DFWD, 3D printed midsole technology, designed to move you forward. When a foot impacts the ground, it applies braking forces. The 4DFWD midsole reduces these forces by redirecting the impact into forward motion. With every step, 4DFWD compresses forward, providing a smooth transition and a unique running experience.

item.name: Runfalcon 2.0 Shoes
item.description:
Get the support you need on your daily run. These adidas running shoes deliver soft cushioning on the treadmill or the streets. A lightweight mixed-material upper adds airy ventilation, keeping you cool wherever the path leads.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description: Look up. What do you see? A wide-open sky. A day full of possibility. Make the most of today, tomorrow and every day after in these sleek NMD_R1 Shoes. Merging archival '80s running style with modern adidas technologies, they support every step with energy-returning Boost. Panels of cloud-inspired print remind you to seize the day. The future is yours. Get after it.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Heart on your sleeve? How about on your shoes? When it comes to these adidas Stan Smith shoes, there's a lot to love. Like their effortless versatility, classic style and easy comfort. Throw them on with yoga tights, denim or an evening gown and keep your feet fresh with every step.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester. Better Rubber is an innovative, sustainable compound made from natural rubber and recycled conventional rubber.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
For 50 years, the adidas Stan Smith Shoes have been a staple on the courts and on the streets. Their minimalist style is the very definition of effortless cool. But even icons have to change to stay rooted in the present, which is why this version of the trainers is created with recycled materials. It's part of our effort and commitment to help end plastic waste.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

Even if it ends up looking very different from what you imagined.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Timeless appeal. Effortless style. Everyday versatility. For over 50 years and counting, adidas Stan Smith Shoes have continued to hold their place as an icon. This pair shows off a fresh redesign that blooms with vibrant floral graphics. Even the classic Stan Smith tongue label gets a playful update in metallic gold. So go ahead, pay tribute to half a century of sleek tennis style every time you lace up.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
How to Make an Impression Without Really Trying: An adidas Guide. Step one, lace into these NMD_R1 Shoes. That's it. The quickest lesson of your life also happens to be the most comfortable. Shout-out to the energy-returning Boost midsole for that. And the sock-like fit.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
What type of adventure calls to you? The city? The outskirts? No matter where you're headed, explore in style in these adidas NMD_R1 Shoes. Taking inspiration from archival outdoor gear, they show off pops of material that mimic the taping on technical jackets. The energizing Boost midsole and stretchy knit upper keep your feet comfy whether you're exploring the city or beyond.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
Perfection is unattainable. Go for interesting instead. A sleek silhouette based on archival designs, these adidas NMD_R1 Shoes fuse sporty running heritage with fresh, city-ready style. The stretchy knit upper rides on an energy-returning Boost midsole and a grippy rubber outsole so you can strut your stuff any way you want to.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Marimekko Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Classic, meet classic. A collaboration with Marimekko, these adidas shoes get completely done-over with the Finnish brand's infamous Laine wave graphic. The expressive design was introduced in 1965, six years before the first Stan Smith stepped onto the tennis court in '71. Now the two come together to make an even bigger impact.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
Rewrite the rules. Progressive from day one, the NMD_R1 Shoes let you go long on futuristic design. These adidas sneakers start with a forever fresh color and then blow it out of the water with that midsole. The stretchy, soft knit upper and extra-cushioned midsole make them so comfortable, you may want to wear them every day. TPU plugs bump up your style game even further. There's no stopping you now.
Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g., cutting scraps and post-consumer household waste, to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description: Stand out in the concrete jungle. Inspired by an acclaimed '80s runner from the adidas archives, these NMD_R1 Shoes provide a sock-like fit with a stretchy and supportive knit upper. Energy-returning Boost cushioning provides all-day comfort, and midsole plugs on the sides stand out as the recognizable mark of iconic NMD style. And if that isn't enough to draw some attention, the chic colors sure will.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description: Stand out in the concrete jungle. Inspired by an acclaimed '80s runner from the adidas archives, these NMD_R1 Shoes provide a sock-like fit with a stretchy and supportive knit upper. Energy-returning Boost cushioning provides all-day comfort, and midsole plugs on the sides stand out as the recognizable mark of iconic NMD style. And if that isn't enough to draw some attention, the chic colors sure will.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Since tennis champion Stan Smith first walked out onto the court in his namesake shoes, the journey hasn't stopped. They've been on catwalks, concert stages and in millions of closets around the world. Now these adidas shoes are looking to the future. The goal? Helping end plastic waste. Recycled materials take that first meaningful step. The low-key, timeless and ever-fresh style is along for the ride. Ready to join Stan?
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
Deciding what to wear to express your mood? Do you feel sporty, casual, chic or sophisticated? Hey, stop overthinking it. Stan Smith's iconic shoe solved this problem decades ago. Clean and classic, these shoes pair with anything and go anywhere. Sleek and simple, they easily dress up or down. Work meeting, art opening or nightclub? Yes. What's even better? This version is made with recycled materials, so you can feel good about, well, feeling good.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
A classic doesn't become a classic overnight. It takes time. And the adidas Stan Smith shoes have a lot of time behind them. They reach all the way back to 1971, when they first stepped onto the tennis court. Now seen everywhere from runways to coffee shops, the clean, iconic design has made its mark. This version steps things up by switching out the signature perforated 3-Stripes for a triple stacked Trefoil.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

item.name: Ozelia Shoes
item.description: If it all has to start somewhere, we'd say the '90s are a pretty solid launching point. Take these Ozelia Shoes. The DNA is straight out of adidas' past, but the futuristic look is all grown up with a sleek, monochromatic build. Adiprene cushioning makes every step feel like a good one.

item.name: Run Falcon 2.0 Shoes
item.description: Strap up in these running shoes and you're set for a jog in the park followed by coffee with friends. With a mesh upper for outstanding breathability, they're meant to deliver comfort all day long. A durable rubber outsole gives you a solid foundation no matter how busy your schedule.

item.name: Run Falcon 2.0 Shoes
item.description: Strap up in these running shoes and you're set for a jog in the park followed by coffee with friends. With a mesh upper for outstanding breathability, they're meant to deliver comfort all day long. A durable rubber outsole gives you a solid foundation no matter how busy your schedule.

item.name: Marimekko Stan Smith Shoes
item.description:
When you're looking to express yourself, you'll want to grab your Stans. Timeless and versatile, adidas Stan Smith shoes have been a canvas for creativity since '71. Just six years before that? Finnish design house Marimekko unveiled their Unikko print — a symbol of fearless originality that stands out on the top of these clean, crisp kicks. Lace in and let your authentic voice shine.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.

An update to an acclaimed '80s runner from the adidas archive, these modern sneakers have a soft, stretchy knit upper and energy-returning Boost cushioning for all-day comfort. Bold color and signature midsole plugs make a statement, so wherever you're headed, you're sure to show up in style.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: X9000L2 Shoes
item.description:
When robots take over the world, you'll be able to outrun them in these adidas running shoes. They come equipped with lightweight and flexible Bounce cushioning. A booster pack of Jetboost in the heel delivers energy return and enhanced stability.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content.

item.name: NMD_R1 Shoes
item.description:
What type of adventure calls to you? The city? The outskirts? No matter where you're headed, explore in style in these adidas NMD_R1 Shoes. Taking inspiration from archival outdoor gear, they show off pops of material that mimic the taping on technical jackets. The energizing Boost midsole and stretchy knit upper keep your feet comfy whether you're exploring the city or beyond.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: NMD_R1 Primeblue Shoes
item.description:
Pack your bag, lace up and get going. City adventures beckon in these NMD_R1 shoes. An update to an acclaimed '80s runner from the adidas archive, these modern sneakers have a soft, stretchy knit upper and energy-returning Boost cushioning for all-day comfort. Bold color and signature midsole plugs make a statement, so wherever you're headed, you're sure to show up in style.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: 4DFWD Pulse Shoes
item.description: Harness the power of adidas 4D for a smoother run every time the rubber meets the road. These adidas 4DFWD Pulse Shoes have a 3D-printed heel cradle that's precisely angled to guide your foot forward on every step and absorb impact so every run feels easier.

item.name: Ultraboost 4.0 DNA Shoes
item.description: A young legend. The adidas Ultraboost shoes debuted in 2015, and they became a go-to far beyond the realm of running. For good reason. The adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in support, adapting to the changing shape of your foot with each take-off and landing. Plush Boost cushioning returns energy with each stride. The more you give, the more you get. So give it your all. These were made for it.

item.name: Runfalcon 2.0 Shoes
item.description:
Get the support you need on your daily run. These adidas running shoes deliver soft cushioning on the treadmill or the streets. A lightweight mixed-material upper adds airy ventilation, keeping you cool wherever the path leads.
This product is made with Primeblue, a high-performance recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic. 50% of the upper is textile, 75% of the textile is Primeblue yarn. No virgin polyester.

item.name: 4DFWD Pulse Shoes
item.description: Harness the power of adidas 4D for a smoother run every time the rubber meets the road. These adidas 4DFWD Pulse Shoes have a 3D-printed heel cradle that's precisely angled to guide your foot forward on every step and absorb impact so every run feels easier.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description:
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Celebrated by hip hop royalty in the '80s. The adidas Superstar shoe is now a lifestyle staple for streetwear enthusiasts. The world-famous shell toe feature remains, providing style and protection. Just like it did on the B-ball courts back in the day.
Now, whether at a festival or walking in the street you can enjoy yourself without the fear of being stepped on.
The serrated 3-Stripes detail and adidas Superstar box logo adds OG authenticity to your look.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description:
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Celebrated by hip hop royalty in the '80s. The adidas Superstar shoe is now a lifestyle staple for streetwear enthusiasts. The world-famous shell toe feature remains, providing style and protection. Just like it did on the B-ball courts back in the day.
Now, whether at a festival or walking in the street you can enjoy yourself without the fear of being stepped on.
The serrated 3-Stripes detail and adidas Superstar box logo adds OG authenticity to your look.

The world-famous shell toe feature remains, providing style and protection. Just like it did on the B-ball courts back in the day.
Now, whether at a festival or walking in the street you can enjoy yourself without the fear of being stepped on.
The serrated 3-Stripes detail and adidas Superstar box logo adds OG authenticity to your look.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description: The adidas Superstar Shoes first stepped onto the basketball hardwood in 1970. It didn't take long for them to make the leap from athletic gear to streetwear staple. These shoes show off the materials, proportions and style that made the original such a legend. They've got a smooth leather upper with sporty 3-Stripes and a heel tab. They're finished off with the world-famous rubber shell toe.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description:
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Celebrated by hip hop royalty in the '80s. The adidas Superstar shoe is now a lifestyle staple for streetwear enthusiasts. The world-famous shell toe feature remains, providing style and protection. Just like it did on the B-ball courts back in the day.
Now, whether at a festival or walking in the street you can enjoy yourself without the fear of being stepped on.
The serrated 3-Stripes detail and adidas Superstar box logo adds OG authenticity to your look.

item.name: Ultraboost 4.0 DNA Shoes
item.description: A young legend. The adidas Ultraboost shoes debuted in 2015, and they became a go-to far beyond the realm of running. For good reason. The adidas Primeknit upper wraps the foot in support, adapting to the changing shape of your foot with each take-off and landing. Plush Boost cushioning returns energy with each stride. The more you give, the more you get. So give it your all. These were made for it.

item.name: Ozelia Shoes
item.description: If it all has to start somewhere, we'd say the '90s are a pretty solid launching point. Take these Ozelia Shoes. The DNA is straight out of adidas' past, but the futuristic look is all grown up with a sleek, monochromatic build. Adiprene cushioning makes every step feel like a good one.

item.name: Forum Low Shoes
item.description: It's never too early to teach your little baller hoops legends and lore. You can start with these adidas Forum Low Shoes sized for kids. They have the chunky profile and signature removable strap that lit up the hardwood in the '80s. Maybe wait on the terry cloth headband and short shorts.

item.name: Forum Bold Shoes
item.description:
The adidas Forum shoes have always served as a platform for self-expression — on the court and on the daily. With this pair, we take the idea of the platform literally and raise up the iconic silhouette on bold, elevated tooling. Rhinestone crystals add a bit of shimmer, because who doesn't need a little glam in their life?
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Forum Low Shoes
item.description: The '80s were a high point of basketball style, and the adidas Forum quickly became legend, first on the hardwood and then on the streets. These juniors' shoes come fully equipped with a leather upper, chunky outsole and a removable strap. Tap into the decade's energy every time you lace them up.

item.name: Forum 84 Low Shoes
item.description: When we unleashed the adidas Forum on the hardwood back in '84, it didn't just dominate the game — it changed it. The X-ankle strap revolutionized performance, and the expressive silhouette was all about personal style. These low top shoes honor the impact with archive-inspired red, plus hairy suede and fuzzy laces.

item.name: Ultraboost 22 Shoes
item.description:
A little extra push. The Ultraboost running shoes serve up comfort and responsiveness at every pace and distance. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper includes foam around the heel to prevent blisters. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole for endless energy, with a Linear Energy Push system for more responsiveness than ever before. A Continental™ Rubber outsole grips in wet and dry conditions so you can stride confidently.
This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description:
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Celebrated by hip hop royalty in the '80s. The adidas Superstar shoe is now a lifestyle staple for streetwear enthusiasts. The world-famous shell toe feature remains, providing style and protection. Just like it did on the B-ball courts back in the day.
Now, whether at a festival or walking in the street you can enjoy yourself without the fear of being stepped on.
The serrated 3-Stripes detail and adidas Superstar box logo adds OG authenticity to your look.

item.name: Ultraboost 22 Shoes
item.description:
A little extra push. The Ultraboost running shoes serve up comfort and responsiveness at every pace and distance. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper includes foam around the heel to prevent blisters. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole for endless energy, with a Linear Energy Push system for more responsiveness than ever before. A Continental™ Rubber outsole grips in wet and dry conditions so you can stride confidently.
This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

item.name: Ultraboost Supernova DNA Shoes
item.description:
Over the decades, adidas Running has continued to change how runners experience comfort. These shoes revive two of the greatest hits: the Supernova from '98 and the Ultraboost from '15. BOOST cushioning and adidas PRIMEKNIT bring ultimate comfort to every single step you take. Disrupted 3-Stripes add a little blast from our running past.
Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

item.name: Ultraboost 22 Shoes
item.description:
A little extra push. The Ultraboost running shoes serve up comfort and responsiveness at every pace and distance. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper includes foam around the heel to prevent blisters. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole for endless energy, with a Linear Energy Push system for more responsiveness than ever before. A Continental™ Rubber outsole grips in wet and dry conditions so you can stride confidently.
This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

item.name: Ultraboost 1.0 DNA Shoes
item.description: Less than 10 years old and it's already a legend. That's the Ultraboost we're talking about. The design that changed the way runners experience comfort quickly found its way into the closets of sneakerheads. These shoes honor the legacy with a focus on the essential details — an adidas PRIMEKNIT upper and energy-returning BOOST in the midsole.

item.name: Ultraboost 1.0 DNA Shoes
item.description: Less than 10 years old and it's already a legend. That's the Ultraboost we're talking about. The design that changed the way runners experience comfort quickly found its way into the closets of sneakerheads. These shoes honor the legacy with a focus on the essential details — an adidas PRIMEKNIT upper and energy-returning BOOST in the midsole.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description:
Originally made for basketball courts in the '70s. Celebrated by hip hop royalty in the '80s. The adidas Superstar shoe is now a lifestyle staple for streetwear enthusiasts. The world-famous shell toe feature remains, providing style and protection. Just like it did on the B-ball courts back in the day.
Now, whether at a festival or walking in the street you can enjoy yourself without the fear of being stepped on.
The serrated 3-Stripes detail and adidas Superstar box logo adds OG authenticity to your look.

item.name: Forum Low Shoes
item.description: It's never too early to teach your little baller hoops legends and lore. You can start with these adidas Forum Low Shoes sized for kids. They have the chunky profile and signature removable strap that lit up the hardwood in the '80s. Maybe wait on the terry cloth headband and short shorts.

item.name: Forum Mid Shoes
item.description: The most advanced B-ball trainer of its time, the adidas Forum is back from the archives and ready to keep changing the game. Rock these mid-cut shoes for juniors and take that slam-dunk energy with you as you wander. School days, weekends away or adventures with your crew? Count these kicks in.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description: Every step taken in them. Every game won in them. Every style compliment given to them. And every dance move busted in them. Summed up, the impact of the adidas Superstar shoes over the past 50 years is tremendous. And that's something worth celebrating. Done up with serrated 3-Stripes, a classic shell-toe cap and luxurious leather upper, these shoes give the iconic style a chic tribute. Step in and make your own moves.

item.name: 4DFWD Pulse Shoes
item.description: Harness the power of adidas 4D for a smoother run every time the rubber meets the road. These adidas 4DFWD Pulse Shoes have a 3D-printed heel cradle that's precisely angled to guide your foot forward on every step and absorb impact so every run feels easier.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description:
Grab your shell-toe shoes. Show the world what you're made of. An icon formed over five decades, the adidas Superstar shoes have graced the feet of pro B-ball players, hip hop stars and style pioneers. This pair celebrates the legacy with soft leather and sophisticated off-white tones. But the real magic behind these kicks? Attitude. The fearless spirit and game-changing energy is basically built in. Can you feel it?
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Forum Bold Shoes
item.description:
Stop. Rewind. Take it back to the '80s. The adidas Forum just stepped out on the hardwood and was making history in hoops, culture and style. Now step into these elevated, platform shoes and feel the energy of the game under your feet. Because this version is all about making a statement, they have a satin upper in fresh pastel colors.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Forum Bold Shoes
item.description: The adidas Forum launched in '84 and quickly took the basketball world by storm. Its slam dunk DNA is back for the streets of today and bolder than ever. Classic elements stay intact: the X-design and the luxurious leather upper. Now the shoes are elevated on a platform outsole that takes your style to the next level.

item.name: Forum 84 Low Shoes
item.description:
The Forum changed the game when it came onto the scene in '84. The iconic adidas shoes weren't just about upping performance levels, they were about creating a foundation of comfort to explore personal expression. All these years later, the goal is still the same. So are the X-detail and ankle strap. Only difference with this version is dramatic colors and decadent gold accents.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Forum Bold Shoes
item.description:
What does confidence look like to you? These adidas shoes explore and express that question. A collaboration with S.E.E.D., the School for Experiential Education in Design, and their inaugural all-female class, they feature soft and durable materials, with satin on the foundation. A platform outsole lets you stand taller.
This product is made with recycled content as part of our ambition to end plastic waste. 20% of pieces used to make the upper are made with minimum 50% recycled content.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description: They first rose to fame on the B-ball court. Then, they became a mainstay in the world of hip hop — there's even a song written about them. After that? Their momentum was unstoppable. The adidas Superstar Shoes transformed into a symbol of creativity, finding their way to the feet of movers, shakers and creators around the globe. Lace up and get in on the action. Bonus: Their classic style is versatile enough to wear anywhere.

item.name: Forum Bold Shoes
item.description: The adidas Forum launched in '84 and quickly took the basketball world by storm. Its slam dunk DNA is back for the streets of today and bolder than ever. Classic elements stay intact: the X-design and the luxurious leather upper. Now the shoes are elevated on a platform outsole that takes your style to the next level.

item.name: Ultraboost 1.0 DNA Shoes
item.description:
You generate the energy. These adidas running shoes return it. That's the magic behind the legendary Ultraboost design. This pair revives the OG adidas Primeknit pattern from 2015 as an ode to the beloved shoe. Lace in and enjoy all-day comfort. Style, too.
This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester. It is also made with Continental™ Better Rubber, an innovative, sustainable compound made from 70% natural rubber, 20% virgin rubber and 10% conventional rubber.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description: The adidas Superstar Shoes first stepped onto the basketball hardwood in 1970. It didn't take long for them to make the leap from athletic gear to streetwear staple. These shoes show off the materials, proportions and style that made the original such a legend. They've got a smooth leather upper with sporty 3-Stripes and a heel tab. They're finished off with the world-famous rubber shell toe.

item.name: Ultraboost 22 Shoes
item.description:
A little extra push. The Ultraboost running shoes serve up comfort and responsiveness at every pace and distance. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper includes foam around the heel to prevent blisters. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole for endless energy, with a Linear Energy Push system for more responsiveness than ever before. A Continental™ Rubber outsole grips in wet and dry conditions so you can stride confidently.
This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

item.name: Superstar Shoes
item.description: Care for an afternoon stroll through the park? How about karaoke at your favorite spot downtown? Whatever strikes your fancy, you're ready to shine in this standout pair of adidas Superstar Shoes. Packed with shimmering style, this version of the '70s classic shows off iridescent details that appear rainbow-like when they catch the light.

item.name: ZX 5K BOOST Shoes
item.description: Ready for the future? You are in these adidas ZX 5K BOOST shoes. Bringing the best of modern technology into the ever-evolving ZX franchise, they charge up your stride and let your style shine. BOOST cushioning takes care of the comfort side of things. Translucent and reflective details keep your feet fresh.

item.description: To be a true creator, sometimes you have to break the rules. Lace up in these adidas Superstar Shoes and do just that. An icon on the hardwood, the arena stage and the streets, this pair encourages you to color outside the lines with serrated details on the 3-Stripes. The clean leather upper and recognizable rubber shell toe pay tribute to the original design from the '70s.
